channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 01:09 Air anxiety in the Vinnytsia region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 01:09 Air anxiety in the Vinnytsia region follow the following messages.#Vinnytsia_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 01:07 Dumping anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.
